key_risks: Customer concentration risk with heavy reliance on Apple

controversies: Moderate disclosures on forced labor policies with room for improvement in transparency
Employee concerns about work-life balance and management practices
environmental_issues: Commitment to reducing environmental footprint, including carbon neutrality and energy efficiency
social_issues: Employee sentiment issues impacting talent retention and operational efficiency
governance_issues: Risks related to IT system upgrades affecting internal controls and operational performance
